component.name: MainScreen
component.script:
sub init() m.spinner = m.top.FindNode("busySpinner") m.buttons = m.top.FindNode("buttons") m.buttons.setFocus(true)
m.buttons.observeField("itemSelected", "onButtonsSelectedChanged") ' m.top.observeField("focusedChild", "onFocusedChildChanged") end sub
sub onButtonsSelectedChanged(pMessage as Object) index = pMessage.getData() id = m.buttons.content.getchild(index).id if id = "stay" m.spinner.visible = false else if id = "reload" m.spinner.visible = true end if
end sub
